price: 57. Soki ozui bokoki likolo na bango o tango ya bitumba, pesa bango etumbu eye ekoki mpo basusu oyo bazali sima na bango babanga, mpe mpo bakanisa.
arabic: فَإِمَّا تَثۡقَفَنَّهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡحَرۡبِ فَشَرِّدۡ بِهِم مَّنۡ خَلۡفَهُمۡ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَذَّكَّرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.
